2470 NORTH STAR ROAD

Harold Hill
National Association of

13^6 Connecticut Avenue, N
Wash!ngton 6, D. C.
Dear Harold:
A belated note to thank you for sending me a revised copy of
the minutes of the NAEB Board of Director's meeting in
Columbus April 28, 1961.
I think this is exactly the right tone as well as the safest
and best way to handle our sessions.
Good job!
Sincerely,_
Richard B. Hul1

radio station. If It Is sent to 2470 North Star Road,
Columbus 21, Ohio, the mail misses one handling and is re¬
ceived about a day sooner.
